# bfts

[![CI](https://github.com/dqn/bfts/workflows/CI/badge.svg)](https://github.com/dqn/bfts/actions)

Type-level Brainfuck interpreter.

[Playground](https://www.typescriptlang.org/play?ts=4.1.2#code/PTAEAsBdIBwZwFwgOYEtLgK4CMB0BjAewFtgATARwDthsAzSOAWAChXIBPGAU1ACVucTABtIARlABeUAEkqkbgCcYi7pAA8AIgDUu7QG0AfHt3qAtAF1DZs7k2GA3K3ZdeAoaIBMU2fKUq1LRNgo2C9YzCTCO1jdTjzK1wI3EjcFN0k4Nw4yNyk9O1cG2LbEpLMivsnNhYQUAB1dHBQVCoYTEgXHn5BEUgAZh85BWVVDU0AGhipwym4-MM7CdBNAEEAIQBhKudagCo91j2pSVOz84vLq+ub27v7m6OnlmPQN-ePz6--EIkGLCiB3AY5aXNYt7IbEqbfdbaQ7PTgkAsxp3Nt3EgZZmzIf8nQHY8xzzQlL2vbg+FQZAoAfHxl1rS1dy-N97WA5ZvyhYtUGECDnX0IiSM-XBgLIqCRxgmpzwhc0IUwYhsCUdQZErGQn1XdkqHYzj7RTeCbzvDQ2I4pQ4EMfQZEPQcGNPWDeABVRh2kkTuN4-i6yEmTRIvK8FCQlCpOE2T5MU+iTzPfNNnAYtFFWDRNkrTZ9MtQyRJ7JyXLgfRNiU6DVKY-NyUgRRWjQOgOHUeFK3hbyX2-MDqO-WiANAAADAASDkAtcjQwMMOVCqimKqDihLgPK3LXRWTQHO6NzCBkNDpAw59QCjbgOEIOhQGKv5ixgfznMUMaYH0VZQpU1reBBRkvQUdRyUIEl8G4ZY5HaSBUtAX9quQHxNHsHwQWHYthEwBD1GNAFAp9Tbtu4WZjX2jpWEcNTfBGAINHJPa2g6I6Tti87LukKrYtQeLHsgla1te0GDsMX6ltAeEeEUa9CHtaR7E0UAAB8Vi0cmVm0UmKc0Mw6ZWOxqcmJncaUAnFC3bH6hi9a-mWCFKw5Y19AAaXFPqBqG0A-gsQVJZXOtNAABlJ1UIQHP4JYsao5Wx67bvuhRNkJn1jQ5-HIEJuAJi+sHDuVy1IZq6H7cgv5uGIQmOCGKh0FQW7UAAL24MgvZ9xQOA9t53D6Hwt1+nwra59lnbS3DQAhTKs+yyDNaOknjWdUNrUFI27oQs3VHUfDfAO5Y+HE7hb3vSPfdmH8+kNEuBy1jPKc0PvVTLjVQErk3uBr9NBBAhuOiblvzNQjvo67+PRF7yC3kFAfMPZHRh53ntRZPj4wzFSfq-NpHfh-EC+6+b7H-Pz4+fQH015j7PWKsxR1BgXUN-QwoDY6-E3p0N+bw-pvyNCfPeRdGYj05E-d4l8K43SrqbW+aCPj4Twe8F+4CfgfwFt7X2ywNIjm0lxIBICwGELjr0UQhDYFfHgR8RBg82YoJfkdAqHJvzkgqkIvOcpGpv1HsKce18cG13rnwZYZCv4UOjssdqnVyRgO7lvR0XwjwqT7twg+zNj4fGkRgieWCp4zzrnPdGi85ZqJ-tOWcZZIGgT7MAlxoDt5cOzkdVONtuZ0WdKrI69DfFoMseXaxxsb4KIcQvee38m4sMgP4z4goz73ysRmH0cjp63xzik5YaTdGZNpIPfQTD3jfm-p4EhvwsoZKaXUsJvxYmyJsYkn0wTbaONSS4pplTPBZPvoY+yhDOHvCmUoJq+gKmQL1v9IpiU8ZpyGRDaKsVKwFLvvE7BxTa4DNJEMzGLB5JiFWRFboz00x2JBjjTZIT06mPXJubs0gtyVnJAIwwhVWm-gkTlMe4ZQAPLJHY+u2FcBnLtisQwmgrD6IHP8weuV1BArznPUFBcrTjyhSc2ev5lhwoRcsTQWhUWzMFBi0xuVtA4rtA-fFpcZEQuJTC5JFLXmDJpiirJ9KBFmBZVKYC7LT6crFNy2+sK2yUpWIzWlTUGW9VyrgcVeE8WSI5VYuVSSyX1kVfy85ZjVWQRFZiiY2q2V6ulQal6PLjV8s5m8qlEwhVoutYy-QdrJUOtHmg-JXo0zqENaSqpR1anQPFKyhF7S425Qs ## Example

```ts
import type { Interpret } from "bfts";

type Result1 = Interpret<"++++[>+++++<-]>--.">;
// type Result1 = "\u0012"

type Result2 = Interpret<"+++++++++[>++++++++>+++++++++++>+++>+<<<<-]>.>++.+++++++..+++.>+++++.<<+++++++++++++++.>.+++.------.--------.>+.>+.">;
// type Result2 = "Hello World!\n"

// With input
type Result3 = Interpret<",+>,+>,+<<.>.>.", "ABC">;
// type Result3 = "BCD"
```
